resources.string: "You're switching to account %1$s. You'll see Mi Drive data associated with this account."
Storing, previewing, downloading files, and more

"Clear all items from Mi Drive to be able to cancel services. Follow these steps to clear items:
1. On the Mi Drive start page, press and hold an item to make the \"Select all\" button appear. Use this button to select up to 200 files at a time and delete them.
2. Once you've deleted all items, clear all files from Recently deleted items."

"1. We recommend backing up your items before deleting them. To do so, visit i.mi.com, click Mi Drive, and download your items to a computer.
2. Please note that items cleared from your Recently deleted items can't be recovered afterwards."

"If you continue, you'll cancel Mi Drive services. We will cease to collect your personal information, and the personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specified period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise."
"Canceling Mi Drive services won't affect your use of other Xiaomi products and services. If you want to delete your Xiaomi Account, you can do that here."

The following items will be deleted permanently after cancellation of services:
1. All items on Mi Drive, including but not limited to documents, private files, and deleted items.
2. Device permissions, settings, and other cached content.
3. Mi Drive upload and download history.
Tap the plus to upload files.
Cloud storage is full. Upgrade your plan to get more storage space.
"Couldn't delete record. Wait a minute or two and try again."
This action will only delete the selected records. No files will be deleted.
"Can't copy items due to insufficient cloud storage space. Upgrade your plan to get more storage space."
Photos of slides stored in the cloud can be adjusted and converted to PDF automatically. Turn on this feature now?
"Can't upload items due to insufficient cloud storage space. Upgrade your plan to get more storage space."
"Your device isn't connected to Wi-Fi. Download items using mobile data?"
"Can't start or end filenames with a space"
"Couldn't find apps that can open this item"
"Couldn't process image. Using the original file instead."
"The item you've copied is already in the destination folder"
"Can't copy items to the same folder"
"Couldn't create folder. A folder with this name already exists."
A system error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"Couldn't delete. Delete items from this folder first."
"Couldn't load. Wait a minute or two and try again."
"The item you're moving is already in the destination folder"
"Can't move items within the same folder"
"This feature isn't available outside of the Chinese mainland"
An error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
"Couldn't rename. An item with this name already exists."
"Couldn't upload. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Tap the plus to upload files.
File size must be greater than 0
"Your device isn't connected to cloud services. To view this item, visit %s on any connected device."
"Your device isn't connected to Wi-Fi. Load using mobile data?"
You can view Home screen layout backups on your mobile device.
"Open Duokan on your phone and go to Bookshelf > Cloud storage to manage storage space. Make sure you're using the current Xiaomi Account as your MIUI system account."
"Open the Recorder app on your Xiaomi device and select the folder with the items stored in the cloud. Make sure you're using the associated Xiaomi Account as your system account."
Using mobile data to stream audio and video may generate additional fees
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
"Uploading isn't available outside of the Chinese mainland"
Deleted items are stored in the trash for 60 days. Delete now?
Deleted items are stored in the trash for 30 days. Delete this item now?
Deleted items are stored in the trash for 90 days. Delete now?
Deleted items are stored in the trash for 180 days. Delete now?
The record will no longer appear here if you delete it.
For accessing account information stored on your device
For accessing account information stored on your device
Access phone number and device status
Access and save photos and files on this device
Access photos and files on device
"Couldn't grant permission. This feature won't work without it."
"Your device isn't connected to Wi-Fi. Play using mobile data?"

"Clear all items from Mi Drive to be able to withdraw consent. Follow these steps to clear items:
1. On the Mi Drive start page, press and hold an item to make the \"Select all\" button appear. Use this button to select up to 200 files at a time and delete them.
2. Once you've deleted all items, clear all files from Recently deleted items."

"1. We recommend backing up your items before deleting them. To do so, visit i.mi.com, click Mi Drive, and download your items to a computer.
2. Please note that items cleared from your Recently deleted items can't be recovered afterwards."

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Drive. We will cease to collect your personal information, and the personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specified period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise."

The following items will be deleted permanently after withdrawal of consent:
1. All items on Mi Drive, including but not limited to documents, private files, and deleted items.
2. Device permissions, settings, and other cached content.
3. Mi Drive upload and download history.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Drive. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Mi Drive provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Mi Drive services. Withdraw consent now?"

Mi Drive Privacy Policy was updated:
%1$s
Read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue.
"You won't be able to keep using Mi Drive unless you agree to the new version of its Privacy Policy. Agree to the updated Privacy Policy now?"
Here you can store files privately.
Try moving files here or upload them directly.
A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
This file is private. Go back to the start page and pull down to view.
Changing file type might make the file unusable
For providing quick sign-in for Xiaomi Account

Mi Drive needs permission to access accounts, photos, and files on your device and send notifications. These permissions will be used to provide quick sign-in for Xiaomi Account and preview, upload, download, and sync items.
For you to be able to sign in with Xiaomi Account, preview, upload, download, and sync files, and check for updates, Mi Drive requires permissions to access your accounts, photos, files, and IMEI.
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing items
The following permission is required to be able to use some features: %s. You can grant this permission in Settings.
For sending notifications regarding Mi Drive uploads and downloads
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing audio files
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing audio files
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing photos
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing videos
For previewing, uploading, downloading, and syncing photos and videos
